game.name: Protocol Paradox
game.genres: Action, Indie, RPG, Strategy, Early Access
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Workshop, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Protocol Paradox is a fast-paced roguelike shooter blending twin-stick combat, anomaly-based weapons and branching lore. Survive procedural sectors, customize builds with weapons and passives, face concept-driven bosses, and replay for new revelations.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Protocol Paradox is a fast-paced roguelike shooter blending twin-stick combat, anomaly-based weapons and branching lore. Survive procedural sectors, customize builds with weapons and passives, face concept-driven bosses, and replay for new revelations.
